content: Again excluding the effect from the income attributable to common shareholders for the first half of this year, the unrealized gains derivatives, the amortization of below market time charters acquired, and the depreciation charged due to the increased value of the vessel acquired with below market charters, the adjusted earnings per share to the common shareholders for the six months also  compared to adjusted earnings of $1.58 basic and $1.57 per share diluted for the same period of 2021 against compared to period the unrealized gain of derivatives and the loss on the sale of a vessel.
